I have never had or seen any potential problems or actual problems.
I don't know what this is? lol
There is lots to do and the students pretty much run it all.
unsure. slow working. busy with life
nothing that I know of on the outreach campus that I attend.
It has so many different options which makes life so much easier!
I love that the outreadch campus still has dances and student council and volunteer options and campus clean up. It gives us something to do to get to know each other better than just as class mates.
There are lots of reasturants close by even on the outreach campus. We also have lots of bake sales and cook offs and picnics for fun or to help raise money so there is always good food around.
I can't rate dorm life at cloud I go to the outreach campus in Junction City and live on my own.

It is a happy medium the teachers usually break it down so well it feels like it is really simple, but when you look at it yorself you get confused and realize what your teacher is reallying doing for you.
Make sure you know what you want to do when you head to college don't take on more than you can handle or want to do.

Cloud is fun to attent with lots of oportunities for the students to be involved in things. There are many different options of how to take classes to fit it around your schedule. Cloud had nice people as teachers.
